sn52.6:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn52.6:1.3: “katamesam ayasma anuruddho dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto”ti?
sn52.6:1.4: “Catunnam khvaham, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.6:1.6: Idhaham, avuso, kaye kayanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn52.6:1.9: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.6:1.10: imesam khvaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.6:1.11: Imesanca panaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta sahassam lokam abhijanami”ti.
